Ask HN: Where to sell high margin, six figure rev business growing 20-30% YoY?
text:
This business has a perfect domain for its industry (think onions.com for an onion seller) and is outgrowing the underlying 4B USD industry by a 4-5x rate, while maintaining 40-50% margins. The product is a physical good and the business has maintained high sales despite the current macroeconomic situation.

Founder is interested in selling but mainly for liquidity reasons - they would love to stay on and keep growing the firm.

Any suggestions for sites (we’ve tried the basic ones like MicroAcquire) where we could sell to someone who has experience in e-commerce or startups more broadly?

Ask HN: What is the role of Product Manager?
text:
A while ago, I was surfing twitter and noticed a video from 23 year old product manager @Meta. The video doesn't seem to reflect the true role of one such product manager. However, it has a lot of "highlight reel" material. If I were to judge by the video, I would get an idea that product managers do not much.

So what is actual role of product manager?

I am genuinely curious because I come from CS background and even getting an interview for a software engineering internship at such huge company is a pretty big deal for me. So the video felt quite out of place.

Disclaimer: Please google for the link. I do not think it is a good idea to share the link.
